name: On Board 4 PC (itch)
description:
Get ready to take control of an amazing warship battle-cruiser and take part in a furious sea battle. Download “On Board 4 PC ” and enter into the world of warships.
Do you like playing war games? Are you looking for a warship game or a boat battle for your device? 
Then there is no better place than “On Board 4 PC ”. An intense battle is about to begin. Steer your warship in the wild sea waves, avoid it from the enemy fleet and go as far as possible in this thrilling version of boat games. Sounds fun? You bet it is!
Are you ready to become the captain of this battle-cruiser and accept the challenge of destroying the enemy fleet? You better be

How to play:
As mentioned above, the objective of this warship game is to go as far as possible. Use easy to learn controls and guide your battle-cruiser in the sea battle environment. Avoid enemy fleet, and don’t forget to collect different power boosters on your way through.

Key Features:

• Great functionality,it works great on Windows PCs and Laptops 
• Amazing graphics and backgrounds
• Fast paced boat games game-play
• Exciting war games levels
• Movie quality sounds and music

Interested in the thrill and the excitement of modern games? “On Board 4 PC ” offers just that. A pure sea adventure experience packed with features and well made 2D graphics. Get yourself ready to command a beast warship to fight against the sea waves and wipe out the enemy fleet by using your big cannon. It’s a must have game on your device if you like warship and adventure games. Download “On Board 4 PC ”, fight for your life and your country. Have fun!
